actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the extent to which a state or political subdivision thereof may tax certain income from sources outside the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit State taxation of: (1) corporate income derived from sources outside of the United States; or (2) income of corporate affiliates that derive 80 percent or more of their income from foreign sources.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the extent to which a state or political subdivision thereof may tax certain income from sources outside the United States.
